articles.description: CNBC Awaaz had reported on Monday evening citing sources that Inox Wind promoter Inox Wind Energy Ltd. (IWEL) planned on selling up to 5% of the company's total equity.
articles.content: Shares of Inox Wind Ltd. declined as much as 9% on Tuesday after a large trade that took place in the stock.As many as 2.75 crore shares or 5% of the company's total equity changed hands in a block d… [+1072 chars]
